4106.verse: وَبَدَا|And will become apparent|190|213|15005$لَهُمْ|to them|72|119|98$سَيِّـَٔـاتُ|(the) evils|88|135|9956$مَا|(of) what|83|130|262$كَسَبُواْ|they earned,|105|128|1788$وَحَاقَ|and will surround|131|145|8381$بِهِم|them|53|81|125$مَّا|what|53|81|262$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|145|94$بِهِۦ|[in it]|57|85|204$يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ|mock.|123|137|5420$

4109.verse: فَأَصَابَهُمْ|Then struck them|137|145|9955$سَيِّـَٔـاتُ|(the) evils|88|104|9956$مَا|(of) what|83|99|262$كَسَبُواْ‌ۚ|they earned.|105|121|1788$وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|135|42$ظَلَمُواْ|have wronged|113|121|558$مِنْ|of|50|60|53$هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ|these,|82|103|335$سَيُصِيبُهُمْ|will strike them|119|140|15009$سَيِّـَٔـاتُ|(the) evils|88|109|9956$مَا|(of) what|83|104|262$كَسَبُواْ|they earned;|106|127|1788$وَمَا|and not|71|82|46$هُم|they|50|278|49$بِمُعْجِزِينَ|will be able to escape.|169|397|6062$

4111.verse: ۞ قُلْ|Say,|89|101|765$يَـٰعِبَادِىَ|`O My slaves!|113|137|13666$ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|116|20$أَسْرَفُواْ|have transgressed|142|166|15010$عَلَىٰٓ|against|68|92|52$أَنفُسِهِمْ|themselves,|99|111|1025$لَا|(do) not|75|85|30$تَقْنَطُواْ|despair|84|103|15011$مِن|of|50|69|53$رَّحْمَةِ|(the) Mercy|99|118|3157$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|(of) Allah.|86|105|2$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|89|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|72|184$يَغْفِرُ|forgives|72|82|3267$ٱلذُّنُوبَ|the sins|90|96|3288$جَمِيعًا‌ۚ|all.|78|90|300$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed He,|92|104|396$هُوَ|He|48|60|298$ٱلْغَفُورُ|(is) the Oft-Forgiving,|166|178|8348$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful.|140|146|398$

4106.verse: And there will appear to them the evils they had earned, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.

4107.verse: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon Us; then when We bestow on him a favor from Us, he says, "I have only been given it because of [my] knowledge." Rather, it is a trial, but most of them do not know.

4108.verse: Those before them had already said it, but they were not availed by what they used to earn.

4109.verse: And the evil consequences of what they earned struck them. And those who have wronged of these [people] will be afflicted by the evil consequences of what they earned; and they will not cause failure.

4110.verse: Do they not know that Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]? Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.

4111.verse: Say, "O My servants who have transgressed against themselves [by sinning], do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful."

4112.verse: And return [in repentance] to your Lord and submit to Him before the punishment comes upon you; then you will not be helped.

4113.verse: And follow the best of what was revealed to you from your Lord before the punishment comes upon you suddenly while you do not perceive,

4114.verse: Lest a soul should say, "Oh [how great is] my regret over what I neglected in regard to Allah and that I was among the mockers."
